1.0.name: wordpress/textme
1.0.description:
TextMe sends a carbon-copy of all admin emails via a SMS text-message to a specified phone number.

TextMe is compatible with these carriers: * T-Mobile * Virgin Mobile * Cingular * Sprint * Verizon * Nextel

Any customer of any of these carriers will be able to receive text messages from TextMe.
